column1: #Text=Jinora says : " Hey , has anyone seen Kai ? "
#Text=Asami says : " I do n't think I 've seen him since we landed . "
#Text=Mako says : " I knew that kid was no good .
#Text=He obviously does n't care about us .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But he 's my new little brother .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " He is just a little boy , and he 's our responsibility .
#Text=Besides , he 's the only airbender we 've recruited so far , we ca n't lose him .
